english.segment1: Something's wrong inside. her problems she can't hide. I'm a victim of a good time. my life is over now and it hasn't yet begun. she left me here to die. mommy don't go. another casualty of irresponsibility is what's become of me. so don't go saving me a seat in class today. I'm a permanent absentee. I wish I could go out and play. but not today. so just scratch my name off of the list. cuz I'll never exist
